summary: Customer charged twice for Pro subscription in same month
suggested_reply: I sincerely apologize for this billing error. I've verified that you were indeed charged twice for your January subscription. I'm processing an immediate refund of $19.99 for the duplicate charge on January 12th. You should see this credited back to your card within 3-5 business days. I've also added a note to your account to prevent this from happening again. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.
